bibl.title: Magic Accusations against Women in the Greco-Roman World from the First to the Fifth Centuries C.E.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Pennsylvania. Summary in DA 62 (2001-2002) p. 1917-A. - Includes texts on papyri, gemstones, and lamellae.
